vulnerability_location.description: The public transfer function has no owner or role-based restriction (no onlyOwner modifier), allowing anyone to trigger transferFrom calls using allowances granted to this contract.
Low-level call to contract_address.call is made without checking its return value
Unbounded loop over dynamic array with external calls may run out-of-gas, causing denial of service when processing large `tos` arrays
Uses low-level call on contract_address.call(...) without checking the returned success value, leading to silent failures and potential gas exhaustion or reentrancy issues.
